Package com.deco2800.game.entities.factories

Class WeaponFactory

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.entities.factories.WeaponFactory
public class WeaponFactory
extends java.lang.Object
Factory to create non-playable character weapon entities with predefined components.

    • createNormalArrow

      create the normal arrow entity fly toward target

      angle - check for target angle from current shooter position to target

      entity arrow

    • createTrackingArrow

      angle - angle from current entity position to target
      Returns:

      owner - owner to hover at until needed
      offset - offset of fireball from center position
      Returns:

      create the vortex for teleportation
      Parameters:
      ownerRunner - entity that call vortex enter
      angle - angle to spin the vortex for transition animate
      reverseSpawn - downscale the entity
      Returns:
      entity vortex

    • createMjolnir

      public static Entity createMjolnir​(short targetLayer, Vector2 target, Hammer owner)
      Makes a hammer projectile that will move towards a target, and then back to the owner entity, when called.
      Parameters:
      target - the location that the blast will try and reach
      targetLayer - the physics layer mjolnir can damage
      owner - - the hammer weapon component that controls the projectile.
      Returns:
      entity
